description:
Prehistoric Dinosaur Adventure!

Dust off your trusty Trash Blaster and get ready for a new super-sized adventure! Another Savvy Island needs your help! And this one’s filled with fearsome dinosaur bankimals! Meet Newton, Pigby’s inventor friend, and use your money sense to help him escape his debt.

FEATURES
•	14 dinosaur bankimals to save!
•	Roar around on a Tyrannosaurus Rex!
•	Soar through the sky on a Pteranodon!
•	Collect lost fossils and help a friend in debt!
name: Dinosaur Island
